actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 101-538.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 999.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Senate incorporated this measure in H.R. 4630 as an amendment.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 4630 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to exchange certain lands in the State of New Mexico and for other purposes.
short_title: Baca Location No. 1 Land Acquisition and Study Act of 1990

summary.text: Baca Location No. 1 Land Acquisition and Study Act of 1990 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture (the Secretary) to purchase specified lands on the south boundary of Baca Location No. 1 (in New Mexico) and include them within the Santa Fe National Forest. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make specified compensation payments to Dunigan Enterprises (after certain certification procedures have been followed) for costs incurred as a result of certain Federal actions involving a land exchange between the United States and Dunigan Enterprises in 1966. Directs the Secretary to study the Baca Location No. 1 for its multiple use potential and acquisition options and report the results to certain congressional committees. Amends the San Juan Wilderness Protection Act of 1984 to make a technical correction to the acreage and legal description of specified property located in Lake Sumner State Park (New Mexico). Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Baca Location No. 1 Land Acquisition and Study Act of 1990
A bill to exchange certain lands in the State of New Mexico and for other purposes.
